title: First reputation-based blockchain guarantees security against 51 percent attacks

title_detail.value: First reputation-based blockchain guarantees security against 51 percent attacks

summary: Researchers have proposed the first blockchain system to guarantee proper performance even when more than 51 percent of the system's computing power is controlled by an attacker.
